entry.title: Tired Stars
entry.summary:
Author: ResidentJazz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,395Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 403

Summary: Dick Grayson has always known how to smile on command, how to play the part people expect — even when it tears him apart. After a public breakdown and a mission that pushes him past his limits, Bruce’s disappointment feels like another verdict he can’t escape. But Jason refuses to let him spiral alone.In the quiet of a safe house, between coffee that tastes like ash, late-night movies, and the weight of a case too close to home, Dick has to confront the question he’s never dared to ask: who is he when he isn’t what Bruce made him?One step at a time, he’ll have to find out.

entry.title: Three's a Crowd
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,905Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

Summary: Dick and Jason pad away to their room, leaving Tim alone on the couch. They are quiet as they brush their teeth in their en suite. On his side of the bed, Jason smoothly pulls his shirt over his head, dropping it on the floor, and slides under the covers. Dick crawls in next to him. He’s warm. “I think Tim’s jealous,” he sighs, throwing an arm over Jason’s middle and settling in close. Instinctively, Jason’s arm goes around him, calloused fingers skimming down his back. “Jealous,” Jason snorts. “Of what?” “Us.” Jason flashes him a skeptical look. “I’m serious, Jay. Ever since that thing with Bernard didn’t work out… I dunno.” “Well, what are we supposed to do about it?” Dick doesn’t have an answer. Jason sighs and rolls over, his body blanketing Dick’s. “Timmy’s a big boy, he can figure his own shit out. He doesn’t need his brothers meddling in his life.”_____Dick, Jason, and Tim get snowed in while on a ski trip. Dick is worried Tim feels left out.

entry.title: My Personal Purgatory
entry.summary:
Author: vampgalmexa

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,868Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 17

Summary: After barely surviving a targeted attack while living under his civilian identity, Jason Todd is forced into the Gotham Safe Haven Center, a refuge designed to contain the broken pieces left behind by the city’s violence. His admission couldn’t have been more ill-timed. He was moments away from revealing himself to Bruce Wayne and delivering the reckoning he believes Bruce never sought after his death.Now, confined within sterile halls, tangled in mandatory evaluations and a system that insists on labeling him as a victim, Jason waits—restless, wounded, and burning with unfinished purpose—for the center’s legal department to authorize his release.But Gotham has a way of shifting destinies, and something within those walls may be forcing Jason to question the vengeance he once thought was absolute.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 216,121Chapters: 46/53Kudos: 1,676

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham. Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave. The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running. Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human. Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.

entry.summary:
Author: Goldandbluejackal

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,036Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 80

Summary: Swinging a bottle of Chivas Regal between his fingers Jason eyed him. He spoke like the last time they’d seen each other they hadn’t been tearing each other’s clothes off with their teeth, like Dick was just another guest. ‘They’re cutting the cake.’ ‘Surprised to see you,’ said Dick, who told himself he absolutely couldn’t feel a slow syrupy heat sliding over his skin as their eyes locked, who told himself he should be irritated, hell, pissed off that the other man had been ignoring him for weeks.Jason and Dick have been dancing around each other for months now. Whatever they are, they don't talk about. But perhaps it's finally time to. Every good confession starts with a skateboarding accident...
